items.content_html: A lightweight animation library built on top of GSAP, designed to make creating complex structural animations quick and easy. With an intuitive API and seamless GSAP integration, Quick-Cast simplifies advanced animation workflows for developers. (Still in development 🚧)
items.title: Mishka122/quick-cast: A lightweight animation library built on top of GSAP, designed to make creating complex structural animations quick and easy. With an intuitive API and seamless GSAP integration, Quick-Cast simplifies advanced animation workflows for developers. (Still in development 🚧)

items.content_html: Netlify/Decap CMS alternative. Fast, lightweight, Git-based headless CMS. Modern UX, first-class i18n support + 100s of improvements. Open source & free. Made with Svelte.
items.title: sveltia/sveltia-cms: Netlify/Decap CMS alternative. Fast, lightweight, Git-based headless CMS. Modern UX, first-class i18n support + 100s of improvements. Open source & free. Made with Svelte.

items.content_html: A zero-race-condition fetch wrapper packed with essential features - timeouts, retries, interceptors, and much more, all while still retained a similar API surface with fetch. Power and simplicity in one lightweight package.
items.title: zayne-labs/call-api: A zero-race-condition fetch wrapper packed with essential features - timeouts, retries, interceptors, and much more, all while still retained a similar API surface with fetch. Power and simplicity in one lightweight package.

items.title: Vexcited/StayReal: An open-source, lightweight and privacy-focused BeReal alternative client.

items.content_html: Gridbox Mailer is a lightweight package built on top of Nodemailer. It simplifies email sending by managing SMTP connections, loading customizable HTML templates, and supporting attachments. Perfect for developers looking for an easy and efficient way to integrate email functionality into their projects.
items.title: gridbox-dev/gridbox-mailer: Gridbox Mailer is a lightweight package built on top of Nodemailer. It simplifies email sending by managing SMTP connections, loading customizable HTML templates, and supporting attachments. Perfect for developers looking for an easy and efficient way to integrate email functionality into their projects.

items.content_html: This application streamlines the management of exhibits in a science museum. The frontend is built using React and Tauri, providing a responsive and lightweight user interface. The backend server and database are developed with Rocket and Rustqlite in Rust, ensuring robust performance and reliability.
items.title: ljt019/exhibit_manager: This application streamlines the management of exhibits in a science museum. The frontend is built using React and Tauri, providing a responsive and lightweight user interface. The backend server and database are developed with Rocket and Rustqlite in Rust, ensuring robust performance and reliability.

items.content_html: 🏠 A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware.
items.title: jens-maus/RaspberryMatic: :house: A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware.
